other_tests.findings: Numerous diverticula of the sigmoid colon with bowel wall thickening consistent with diverticulitis. A left pelvic fluid collection that had previously measured 3 cm has almost resolved; a tiny residual fluid pocket measuring 1.1 cm is now seen, unchanged trace fluid in the pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A left pelvic fluid collection reduced from 3 cm to 1.1 cm; now too small for image-guided drainage.
